description: Number of n X n matrices with exactly 2 1's in each row and column, other entries 0.
comments: Or, number of labeled 2-regular relations of order n.Also number of ways to arrange 2n rooks on an n X n chessboard, with no more than 2 rooks in each row and column (no 3 in a line). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Aug 03 2013
